abstract.p: A solution for improving generally the selecting of window coverings, and more specifically, a method, system, and program product for selecting window coverings is provided. A method may include receiving at least one window attribute of a structure
obtaining a plurality of information via an electronic medium
and presenting at least one window covering option via the electronic medium, wherein the option is based on the at least one window attribute and the plurality of information.

abstract.p: A solution for improving generally the selecting of window coverings, and more specifically, a method, system, and program product for selecting window coverings is provided. A method may include receiving at least one window attribute of a structure
obtaining a plurality of information via an electronic medium
and presenting at least one window covering option via the electronic medium, wherein the option is based on the at least one window attribute and the plurality of information.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: METHOD, SYSTEM AND PROGRAM PRODUCT FOR SELECTING WINDOW COVERINGS
PROCEDE, SYSTEME ET PRODUIT-PROGRAMME DESTINES A LA SELECTION DE COUVRE-FENETRES

abstract.p: A solution for improving generally the selecting of window coverings, and more specifically, a method, system, and program product for selecting window coverings is provided. A method may include receiving at least one window attribute of a structure
obtaining a plurality of information via an electronic medium
and presenting at least one window covering option via the electronic medium, wherein the option is based on the at least one window attribute and the plurality of information.

La présente invention concerne une solution destinée à améliorer de manière générale la sélection de couvre-fenêtres et, plus spécifiquement, un procédé, un système et un produit-programme destinés à la sélection de couvre-fenêtres. Un procédé peut consister à : recevoir au moins un attribut de fenêtre d'une structure
obtenir une pluralité d'informations par l'intermédiaire d'un support électronique
et présenter au moins une option de couvre-fenêtre grâce au support électronique, l'option reposant sur l'attribut de fenêtre et la pluralité d'informations.
